verses.verse: אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יַקְהֵ֣ל <S%H6950><s%> assembled שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Then Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> and all the heads הַמַּטּוֹת֩ <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes נְשִׂיאֵ֨י <S%H5387><s%> the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לִבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <S%H5927><s%> that they might bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מֵעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> out of the city דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> which צִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> which [is] Zion

וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <S%H6950><s%> assembled אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> themselves unto king שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּיֶ֥רַח <S%H3391><s%> in the month הָאֵֽתָנִ֖ים <S%H388><s%> Ethanim בֶּחָ֑ג <S%H2282><s%> at the feast ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> which הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <S%H7637><s%> which [is] the seventh

וַיָּבֹ֕אוּ <S%H935><s%> came כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> And all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> took up הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> the ark

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <S%H5927><s%> And they brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> vessels הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> and all the holy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> that [were] in the tabernacle וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> bring up אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> even those did the priests וְהַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַנּוֹעָדִ֣ים <S%H3259><s%> that were assembled עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> unto him [were] with him before הָֽאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark מְזַבְּחִים֙ <S%H2076><s%> sacrificing צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> and oxen אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> could יִסָּפְר֛וּ <S%H5608><s%> that could not be told וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִמָּנ֖וּ <S%H4487><s%> nor numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> brought in הַ֠כֹּהֲנִים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמ֛וֹ <S%H4725><s%> unto his place אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into דְּבִ֥יר <S%H1687><s%> into the oracle הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> to the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H6944><s%> holy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under כַּנְפֵ֥י <S%H3671><s%> [place even] under the wings הַכְּרוּבִֽים׃ <S%H3742><s%> of the cherubims

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הַכְּרוּבִים֙ <S%H3742><s%> For the cherubims פֹּרְשִׂ֣ים <S%H6566><s%> spread forth כְּנָפַ֔יִם <S%H3671><s%> [their] two wings אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> over מְק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> over the place הָֽאָר֑וֹן <S%H727><s%> of the ark וַיָּסֹ֧כּוּ <S%H5526><s%> covered הַכְּרֻבִ֛ים <S%H3742><s%> and the cherubims עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> and the staves מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> thereof above

וַֽיַּאֲרִכוּ֮ <S%H748><s%> And they drew out הַבַּדִּים֒ <S%H905><s%> the staves וַיֵּרָאוּ֩ <S%H7200><s%> were seen out רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> that the ends הַבַּדִּ֤ים <S%H905><s%> of the staves מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> [place] before הַדְּבִ֔יר <S%H1687><s%> the oracle וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> could יֵרָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> and they were not seen הַח֑וּצָה <S%H2351><s%> without וַיִּ֣הְיוּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> are there עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and there they are unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

אֵ֚ין <S%H369><s%> There בָּֽאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> [There was] nothing in the ark רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> save שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> the two לֻח֣וֹת <S%H3871><s%> tables הָאֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> of stone אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הִנִּ֥חַ <S%H3240><s%> put שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses בְּחֹרֵ֑ב <S%H2722><s%> there at Horeb אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> where כָּרַ֤ת <S%H3772><s%> made יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [a covenant] with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> when they came out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> happened בְּצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> were come out הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> And it came to pass when the priests מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy וְהֶעָנָ֥ן <S%H6051><s%> [place] that the cloud מָלֵ֖א <S%H4390><s%> filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֧וּ <S%H3201><s%> could הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> So that the priests לַעֲמֹ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> not stand לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <S%H8334><s%> to minister מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> because הֶֽעָנָ֑ן <S%H6051><s%> of the cloud כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> had filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> for the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD פ

אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> Then אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Then spake שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> said לִשְׁכֹּ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> that he would dwell בָּעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> in the thick darkness

בָּנֹ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> I have surely בָנִ֛יתִי <S%H1129><s%> built בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> thee an house זְבֻ֖ל <S%H2073><s%> to dwell in לָ֑ךְ מָכ֥וֹן <S%H4349><s%> a settled place לְשִׁבְתְּךָ֖ <S%H3427><s%> for thee to abide in עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וַיַּסֵּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> about הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> his face וַיְבָ֕רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַ֣ל <S%H6951><s%> all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> (and all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹמֵֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> stood

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בָּר֤וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> which spake בְּפִ֔יו <S%H6310><s%> with his mouth אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father וּבְיָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> and hath with his hand מִלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> fulfilled לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> [it] saying

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> Since הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Since the day אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> i הוֹצֵ֜אתִי <S%H3318><s%> that I brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Israel מִמִּצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָחַ֣רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> I chose בְעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> no city מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> that my name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> might be there וָאֶבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> might be therein but I chose בְּדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David לִֽהְי֖וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to be over עַמִּ֥י <S%H5971><s%> to be over my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבַ֖ב <S%H3824><s%> And it was in the heart דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> of David אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> my father לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> my father יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H3824><s%> it was in thine heart לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build בַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <S%H8034><s%> unto my name הֱטִיבֹ֔תָ <S%H2895><s%> thou didst well כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in לְבָבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3824><s%> that it was in thine heart

רַ֣ק <S%H7535><s%> Nevertheless אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִבְנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> thou shalt not build הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but בִּנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> but thy son הַיֹּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> that shall come forth out מֵחֲלָצֶ֔יךָ <S%H2504><s%> of thy loins הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he יִבְנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> he shall build הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> the house לִשְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> unto my name

וַיָּ֣קֶם <S%H6965><s%> hath performed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֖וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> that he spake וָאָקֻ֡ם <S%H6965><s%> and I am risen up תַּחַת֩ <S%H8478><s%> place דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> in the room of David אָבִ֜י <S%H1><s%> my father וָאֵשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and sit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> promised יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD וָאֶבְנֶ֣ה <S%H1129><s%> and have built הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> an house לְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> for the name יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וָאָשִׂ֨ם <S%H7760><s%> And I have set שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> There מָקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> there a place לָֽאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> for the ark אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> There בְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> wherein [is] the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַת֙ <S%H3772><s%> which he made עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> with our fathers בְּהוֹצִיא֥וֹ <S%H3318><s%> when he brought them out אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt ס
